START About Us REVOLUTION SLIDER 6.5.14
END REVOLUTION SLIDER
ABOUT
Set high above the city, Rosa Sky is a rooftop lounge in Miami‚Äôs Brickell area.
Rosa Sky
is scenic and serene, with panoramic views of the shimmering Miami skyline, colorful
hand-crafted cocktails
, globally inspired tapas, and a bold music lineup.
Rosa Sky is a vibrant city escape on the 22nd floor of the dual-brand AC & Element Hotel Miami Downtown. Guests have direct access to a street-facing elevator (SW 1st Court) and are transported to stunning sky views above the Brickell city center.
The globally inspired
tapas menu
is eclectic and exciting, featuring masterful remixes of crave-worthy classics, and is available throughout the lounge and presented for easy sharing.
The hand-crafted seasonal cocktail program is curated with the freshest ingredients, serving colorful, whimsical creations. Signature cocktails include The Rosa Sky, Tulum Trip & Golden Hour. Rosa Sky also features a
ros√© wine list
with selections spanning the globe.
In a space lit up by the night sky and digitally mapped light choreography, guests are treated to bold sounds by some of Magic City‚Äôs favorite DJs and music makers.
Rosa Sky is your favorite rooftop retreat.
Make A Reservation

START SPECIAL EVENTS REVOLUTION SLIDER 6.5.14
END REVOLUTION SLIDER
Events & Entertainment in Miami
Experience the best events in Miami this week and every weekend at Rosa Sky, where vibrant energy meets stunning skyline views. Our rooftop venue offers unforgettable moments with great music, delicious drinks, and an electric atmosphere.
Make Rosa Sky your go-to spot for the hottest events in Miami. Book your spot today and elevate your nightlife experience!
Reservations
Pink Spice
August & September
A 3-course prix fixe menu for $45, featuring signature bites like Cuban ‚ÄúCigars,‚Äù Duck Dumplings, and Five Spice Churros & optional cocktail pairing to elevate each course. Available Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Sundays throughout August and September.
Pink Spice
August & September
A 3-course prix fixe menu for $45, featuring signature bites like Cuban ‚ÄúCigars,‚Äù Duck Dumplings, and Five Spice Churros & optional cocktail pairing to elevate each course. Available Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, and Sundays throughout August and September.
Pisces Moon Rising
Sunday, September 7 | 8pm-2am
Surrender to the pull of the Pisces full moon as it rises over Brickell‚Äôs skyline. Dive into dreamy energy, sip celestial cocktails, and let deep beats wash over you. The night sky becomes your escape, where cosmic currents guide the dance floor and every moment feels written in the stars.
Sunday Soir√©e
Turn the funk up & Brunch to the beat! Join us for a groovy afternoon with bottomless drinks, delicious bites, and electric views. Enjoy vibrant tunes and good vibes every Sunday from 2 PM to 6 PM.
Our Sunday Soir√©e is where Miami‚Äôs rhythm comes alive, perfect for anyone chasing good times, bold flavors, and rooftop vibes that hit just right. If you‚Äôre looking for the best events in Miami this weekend, this is your scene.
Sunday Soir√©e
Turn the funk up & Brunch to the beat! Join us for a groovy afternoon with bottomless drinks, delicious bites, and electric views. Enjoy vibrant tunes and good vibes every Sunday from 2 PM to 6 PM.
Our Sunday Soir√©e is where Miami‚Äôs rhythm comes alive, perfect for anyone chasing good times, bold flavors, and rooftop vibes that hit just right. If you‚Äôre looking for the best events in Miami this weekend, this is your scene.
Martes De Rosas
Experience the vibrant energy of Miami Latin nights at Rosa Sky with Martes De Rosas! Join us every Tuesday after 8pm for sultry beats, captivating cocktails, and breathtaking rooftop views that bring the city‚Äôs energy to life.
This weekly celebration is a must for those seeking some of the best nightlife events Miami has to offer, blending vibrant rhythms with an unbeatable rooftop atmosphere.

START PRIVATE EVENTS REVOLUTION SLIDER 6.5.14
END REVOLUTION SLIDER
Rooftop Private Events at Rosa Sky
Host an unforgettable private event at Rosa Sky, Miami‚Äôs premier rooftop destination. With panoramic skyline views, handcrafted cocktails, culinary offerings, and sharable bites, your Miami private rooftop event will be perfect at Rosa Sky. Set high over the city in the core of Brickell, Miami, FL Rosa Sky is a lively, 4,000-square-foot up-in-the-sky lounge (on the 22nd floor) of the AC & Element Miami Brickell. Inquire today!
Book now to elevate your event with unforgettable views at Brickell Miami‚Äôs premier rooftop destination, Rosa Sky. For booking and inquiries, please complete the online form today.
Contact Us
Private Event Venue Accommodations
Rosa Sky offers a variety of versatile spaces, designed to accommodate events of all sizes, we have the perfect setting for you, with accommodations ranging from 20 to 150 guests:
Full Venue (3500 sqft) ‚Äì 100 ‚Äì 150 guests
Garden Patio plus Couch ‚Äì 40 ‚Äì 60 guests
Garden Patio Only- 30 guests
High Top ‚Äì 25 guests
Types of Private Events
We specialize in hosting a wide variety of private events, each thoughtfully crafted to offer an unforgettable experience. Whether you‚Äôre planning an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, our rooftop venue provides the perfect setting to elevate your event.
Corporate Events & Networking
‚Äì Ideal for team-building functions, networking mixers, and client meetings with a sophisticated atmosphere and stunning city views.
Weddings & Engagement Parties
‚Äì A romantic venue for intimate engagements or grand wedding celebrations, creating unforgettable moments.
Birthday Parties & Milestone Celebrations
‚Äì Celebrate special birthdays, anniversaries, or milestones with vibrant, customizable packages.
Private Dinners & Cocktail Parties
‚Äì Elegant private dinners or cocktail gatherings with handcrafted cocktails, delicious bites, and exceptional views.
Social Gatherings & Celebrations ‚Äì
Perfect for reunions, casual get-togethers, or any social celebration with a lively, stylish atmosphere.
Parties and Events Menu
Our pre-set private events menu features a curated selection of globally inspired tapas, seasonal cocktails, and specialty bites, perfect for sharing. Customizable to suit your event, the menu ensures a memorable experience for your guests.
For more information or to discuss your event details,¬† fill out the online form below and someone from our team will be in touch with you directly.
Private Event FAQs
Is there a food and beverage minimum for private events?
Yes, the food and beverage minimum varies depending on the size and nature of your event. Contact our events team for more details and to discuss tailored options.
Are bar or drink packages available for private events?
Yes, we offer customizable bar packages and drink options for private events. You can choose from pre-set packages or opt for a bar on consumption, where you only pay for the drinks your guests enjoy. Our events team can help design a package tailored to your preferences, including cocktails, wine selections, and more.
Is there a required deposit for private events?
A deposit is required to secure your event booking. The amount is based on the size and details of your event, and our events team will provide the full breakdown upon inquiry.
Are sales tax and service fees applied to private events?
Yes, sales tax and service fees are applied to the total cost of your event. These fees are in line with industry standards and will be included in your event proposal.
Is there a set menu for private events?
We offer a pre-set menu featuring globally inspired tapas, seasonal cocktails, and specialty bites. Customization is available to ensure the menu fits your event and guests‚Äô preferences.
Can you accommodate dietary restrictions for private events?
Yes, we accommodate dietary restrictions such as vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and more. Please inform our events team when booking to ensure the best options are available for your guests.
Are decorations allowed for private events?
Decorations are allowed within certain guidelines. Please coordinate with our events team to ensure your d√©cor complies with venue policies and safety regulations.
What parking options are available for private events?
Guests can utilize nearby parking facilities or valet services. Our events team can provide further information and assist with arrangements.
When is the final guest count due for private events?
The final guest count must be confirmed at least 72 hours before the event to ensure accurate preparation. Changes after this time may impact food and beverage arrangements.
Is there a cancellation policy for private events?
Yes, cancellations must be made within a specific time frame to avoid fees. Please note that deposits are non-refundable. Reach out to our events team for details on our cancellation policy.
Private Event Software powered by Tripleseat
